about_the_game:
Deprived of your memories, you find yourself in an unfamiliar place. Tremendous power smolders within you, waiting for the right spark to rekindle it. Recall the incantations required to summon creatures to fight for you. Cast spells to enhance your allies and hinder your enemies. Collect artifacts of old to further mold your magical talents.

Your foes might be innumerable, but your potential is limitless.

Cards? Check. Deck building? Check. Turn-based gameplay? Not this time.

Into the Underworld offers a mix of auto-battler and real time strategy games with the sublime thrill of constructing your own, unique play style from a plethora of options. Complete your deck, discover powerful card combinations and hone your strategy against varied enemies in tense, real-time battles.

This is a dangerous place, steeped in dark fantasy lore. Every secret has to be torn from the obscuring shroud of ages past, and the hands of the Underworld’s corrupted servants. You will perish, but death cannot stop you for long - and you will return from each expedition with new knowledge and power.

Unlockable, persistent upgrades and an evolving storyline will keep you coming back to face the darkness again and again.

We are a small team who believes in making the kind of titles we ourselves like to play - and we think you’ll enjoy them too. If Into the Underworld looks like your cup of tea, please consider adding it to your Steam wishlist - it helps us a lot!

We encourage our community to take active part in the creation of our games, and this one is no different. Jump onto our Discord server, leave a note on the game forums or shoot us an email - we’d love to hear your thoughts on Into the Underworld!

content_descriptors.notes: There are moderate amounts of blood and violence throughout the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-4670K @ 3.40GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 970 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The world is fractured - so is your mind. In this dark fantasy roguelite, deck building meets real-time battles. Prove yourself in semi-automated fights using an evolving deck of monsters and spells. Unlock new cards and rebuild your memories - but you might be surprised at what you uncover.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
